name: The Universe Within You
description: I got my hands on a tablet and wanted to try my hand at digital art. First of all, the Tab S7 is incredible - that S Pen works so well and the tablet is a beast! Possibly the best Android tablet ever made aside from its big sister the S7+. This piece is about a quote made by the first Shi'a Imam, Ali ibn Abu Talib, which I have been thinking about a lot lately. I think it's a profound statement about our place in the universe and the essence of monoreality.
